title: Publisher Correction: Immune evasion through mitochondrial transfer in the tumour microenvironment
author: Hideki Ikeda
excerpt: Nature - Publisher Correction: Immune evasion through mitochondrial transfer in the tumour microenvironment
text: Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08439-0 Published online 22 January 2025In the version of the article initially published, the far-left panel in Fig. 1c was labelled “Bulk TIL02” and has now been amended to “Bulk TIL04” in the HTML and PDF versions of the article. html:
Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08439-0 Published online 22 January 2025

In the version of the article initially published, the far-left panel in Fig. 1c was labelled “Bulk TIL02” and has now been amended to “Bulk TIL04” in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
